title: Thai Burger

ingredients.content: 1 stalk lemon grass, fresh, tough outer layer removed, cut in pieces (1 cm)
2 spring onions, cut in lengths (2 cm)
400 g beef mince, broken in pieces

preparations.content: Place lemon grass, chilli and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add spring onions and coriander leaves then chop <b>3 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add mushrooms and salt then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add minced meat and fish sauce then mix <b>15 sec/speed 3<b> while stirring with spatula through hole in mixing bowl lid.

Shape mixture into 4 burgers (Ø 10 cm). Heat oil in a large frying pan over a medium heat on hob then fry burgers for 4-5 minutes on each side until golden brown. Serve hot with buns or salad, for example.

hintsAndTricks: For more heat, retain chilli seeds.
